name: SHARPy
body:
![SHARPy Logo](https://workspace.imperial.ac.uk/aeroelastics/Public/images/SHARPy_logo.png)
### Welcome to SHARPy
You are in the project pages for the framework for Simulation of High-Aspect-Ratio Planes. This is a simulation environment originally built at the **Load Control & Aeroelastics Group** at Imperial College London (http://www.imperial.ac.uk/aeroelastics). 

The current distribution is in its beta version. There will be updates coming here regularly. If you wish to contribute, please do contact us at r.palacios@imperial.ac.uk.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
